attributes.action: dissolve Parliament due to the widespread corruption of MPs from all parties who have used tax payers money for inappropriate and extravagant expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs from all parties have used public money to claim for expenses which are totally inappropriate. This has caused protests from the public and apologies from politicians. However, these acts represent a very serious abuse of trust of MPs with their constituents. Therefore parliament should be disolved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
